name: Camo PickUp
description: The Pickup Truck is currently the biggest vehicle in scum when it comes to carrying passengers and load. Even tho the SUV has the same cargo grid size, the maximum load is lower. 4 people inside the truck can use handguns to shoot while driving, while another 2 players can take place on the back.

name: Camo PickUp UPGRADE
description: Tired of your eye catching colored pickup? You can upgrade any pickup to camo for only 50.-!

name: Black SUV
description: The SUV is the standard vehicle in scum. It is the most common and gets you and 4 other passengers from A to B safely. The cargo space is as large as that of the pickup, but the total weight of the vehicle is lower.

name: Blue SUV
description: The SUV is the standard vehicle in scum. It is the most common and gets you and 4 other passengers from A to B safely. The cargo space is as large as that of the pickup, but the total weight of the vehicle is lower.

name: Camo Quad
description: The Quad. Compact, maneuverable, fast and suitable for off-road use, the quad brings you and another player quickly through rough terrain. The disadvantage of the quad is the very small cargo space in the form of a box.

name: Blue Quad
description: The Quad. Compact, maneuverable, fast and suitable for off-road use, the quad brings you and another player quickly through rough terrain. The disadvantage of the quad is the very small cargo space in the form of a box.

name: Red Quad
description: The Quad. Compact, maneuverable, fast and suitable for off-road use, the quad brings you and another player quickly through rough terrain. The disadvantage of the quad is the very small cargo space in the form of a box.

description: The Quad. Compact, maneuverable, fast and suitable for off-road use, the quad brings you and another player quickly through rough terrain. The disadvantage of the quad is the very small cargo space in the form of a box.

name: Tracktor
description: The tractor is ideal for building bases due to its design and large loading area of 24×72. Logs or two other players find enough space in the back of the metal box. The only disadvantages are the low speed, the Co2 emission and the noise level.

name: Motorboat
description: A motorboat, speedboat or powerboat is a boat that is powered by an engine. Some motorboats are fitted with inboard engines, others have an outboard motor installed on the rear, containing the internal combustion engine, the gearbox and the propeller in one portable unit. An inboard-outboard contains a hybrid of an inboard and an outboard, where the internal combustion engine is installed inside the boat, and the gearbox and propeller are outside.
